alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 8:43PM EST until March 17 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Indiana... Wabash River at New Harmony. .The Wabash River at New Harmony will continue to rise tomorrow and through the weekend, cresting nearly 3 feet above flood stage Monday morning. For the Wabash River...including New Harmony...Minor flooding is forecast. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY, MARCH 17... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...Until Friday, March 17. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CST Thursday the stage was 16.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.9 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday, March 17. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
